org.b3log.latke.cache.gae
类 Memcache<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable>

java.lang.Object
  org.b3log.latke.cache.gae.Memcache<K,V>
类型参数：
K - the key of an object
V - the type of objects
所有已实现的接口：
org.b3log.latke.cache.Cache<K,V>
public final class Memcache<K extends Serializable,V extends Serializable>
extends Object
implements org.b3log.latke.cache.Cache<K,V>

Simple warper of Google App Engine memcache service.

Note:

  • Invoking removeAll() will clear all caches.
  • Statistics does not respect caches, this will return statistic states sum for all caches.

版本：
1.0.1.6, Dec 3, 2011
作者：
Liang Ding
